deposit.title: deposit
deposit.description:
This command allows you to deposit the money have in
your wallet, into your bank.

Syntax: ``pls deposit <amount>``
Aliases: ``dep``

withdraw.title: withdraw
withdraw.description:
This command allows you to withdraw money from your bank,
into your wallet.

Syntax: ``pls withdraw <amount>``
Aliases: ``with``

give.title: give
give.description:
This command allows you to share money in your wallet, with other
registered users.

Syntax: ``pls give <amount> <@the-user's-tag>``
Aliases: ``share``

roll.title: roll
roll.description:
This command allows you to gamble money in your
wallet. You and the bot roll two dices and
whoever gets the higher sum wins double the
amount gambled.

Syntax: ``pls roll <amount>``

invest.title: invest
invest.description:
This command allows you to invest in stock. It uses the money
in your wallet. You have to provid the company ticker symbol
and the number of shares you want. The share prices are not
accurate and the data is obtained from yfinance API, so all
ticker symbols may not work.

Syntax: ``pls invest <company-ticker-symbol> <no-of-shares>``

sell.title: sell
sell.description:
This command allows you to sell your stocks. 

Syntax: ``pls sell <company-ticker-symbol> <no.-of-shares>``

price.title: price
price.description:
This command shows you to check a company's current share price
and optionally the total amount it would cost to buy the
specified number of shares.
<no.-of-shares> is optional

Syntax: ``pls price <company-ticker-symbol> <no.-of-shares>``
